desc: Affordable, Computerised, Edge to Edge, Longarm Quilting Services, Patchwork Workshops for Beginners and Intermediates, and a Space for Sit & Sew Days. Bookings taken for Trunk Shows for Quilters Groups and Orders for Commissioned Quilts.
